document_data.mainbody:
inazzil was a small town found along the coast within the Cities of the Ancients region of east Zakhara in 1367 DR.
Yinazzil was found approximately  southwest of Rogosto along the coast of Bahr al-Ajami. It lay at the edge of the jungle but was not close to any of the mighty rivers of the Ruined Kingdoms, making the purpose of its location somewhat puzzling.
